response.answer_text: "Danny's Song" is a song written by American singer-songwriter Kenny Loggins, as a gift for his brother Danny for the birth of his son, Colin. It first appeared on an album by Gator Creek and a year later on the album Sittin' In, the debut album by Loggins and Messina. The song is well remembered for both the Loggins and Messina original, as well as for Anne Murray's 1972 top-ten-charting cover.

I’m guessing you’re thinking of Danny’s Song written by Kenny Loggins and performed by Loggins and Messina. It was released in November 1971 on the album “Sittin’ In” (although I really like the live version L&M did on the album “On Stage”). More information can be found on Wikipedia here.
